    • Uses of BugPronenessMeasure in pl.edu.mimuw.changeanalyzer.models.measures

      Classes in pl.edu.mimuw.changeanalyzer.models.measures that implement BugPronenessMeasure 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GeometricMeasure
      This measure assigns bug-proneness score of 1.0 to the last commit of a chunk and geometrically decreasing scores to the previous ones.
      class  LinearMeasure
      This measure assigns bug-proneness score of 1.0 to the last commit of a chunk and linearly decreasing scores to the previous ones.
      class  WeightedMeasure
      This measure assigns bug-proneness score propoportionally to the number of fine-grained changes since the last bug-fix.
